AzureBlade: Prowl, there was this guy sending a distress signal, can 
you take care of him?

He concentrates harder, trying to connect his spark and Nightstrike's.

OOC: That's about all we can do until Airly is back

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> He watched as Azure, did his thing. Although his words were little
> comfort.
> "Ok. Guys if a big, mean, angry Decepticon wakes up, toast his ass
> plates!"
> 
> OOC: I'm back! Thats about it....
